Starters.nom: Pan-fried duck foie gras with quince
Starters.desc: quince cake and infusion with verbena
cream of porcini mushrooms, black tea emulsion

Pisces.nom: Roasted John Dory with Taggiasche Olives
Pisces.desc: artichoke mousseline, fish stock with kalamansi lemon
variation of rice and shellfish, turmeric juice

Meats.nom: Piglet chop and crispy Cantal pork belly
Duck fillet roasted on the skin, port juice infused with hibiscus
Meats.desc: Fig tartlet and candied leg, small fig chartreuse

Meats.nom: Golden veal sweetbreads with porcini mushrooms
Meats.desc: porcini mushroom mousseline, veal jus with Morvan cazette

Cheeses.nom: Trolley of refined cheeses from our regions

Desserts.nom: Poached Louise Bonne pear with sweet lemon
Desserts.desc: iced parfait with Nepeta, small spelled crumble
chiboust with vanilla and grand cru chocolate from Madagascar
